this is a function that compares genotype calls across two experiments

shared_genotypes.Rd

this is a function that compares genotype calls across two experiments

shared_genotypes(
  experiment_1_path,
  experiment_2_path,
  shared,
  experiment_1_name,
  experiment_2_name
)

Arguments

experiment_1_path

the file path to the first souporcell directory
experiment_2_path

the file path to the second souporcell directory
shared

numeric- the number of shared genotypes between the experiments
experiment_1_name

the name of experiment 1
experiment_2_name

the name of experiment 2

Value

a data frame of the shared genotype clusters between the two experiments

Examples

# \donttest{
#' shared_genotypes()
# }
